biotools.summary: Reconstruct ancestral gene orders of a phylogenetic tree. Given the topology of a phylogenetic tree and the gene orders of the leaf nodes, it calculates sets of gene orders for the inner nodes, represented by conserved intervals.

bioschemas.name: Roci
